headerDisplay: For help and support please visit our GitHub Wiki. We hope you find this plugin useful!

username.title: Username
username.description: Your username for accessing the Flume site at https://portal.flumetech.com

password.title: Password
password.description: Your password for accessing the Flume site

client_id.title: Client ID
client_id.description: Your Client ID for API access, found in Settings on the Flume site

client_secret.title: Client Secret
client_secret.description: Your Client Secret for API access, found in Settings on the Flume site

polling_minutes.title: Update Interval
polling_minutes.description: Number of minutes between updates. API has a cap of 120 calls per hour.

handicap.title: Adjustment for False Positives
handicap.description: Set to ignore a steady water draw below this value (gallons).
